author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Costco Wholesale Reports January Sales Results
text:
Feb 8 (Reuters) - Costco Wholesale Corp:
* ORATION REPORTS JANUARY SALES RESULTS * ‍NET SALES OF $12.24 BILLION FOR MONTH OF JANUARY, FIVE WEEKS ENDED FEBRUARY 4, UP 8.4 PERCENT FROM $11.29 BILLION LAST YEAR​
* ‍JANUARY U.S. COMPARABLE SALES EXCLUDING IMPACTS FROM CHANGES IN GASOLINE PRICES AND FOREIGN EXCHANGE UP 3.6​ PERCENT
* U.S COMPARABLE SALES UP 4.9 PERCENT FOR JANUARY ‍​ * ‍JANUARY TOTAL COMPANY COMPARABLE SALES EXCLUDING IMPACTS FROM CHANGES IN GASOLINE PRICES AND FOREIGN EXCHANGE UP 2.9%​
* ‍JANUARY TOTAL COMPANY COMPARABLE SALES UP 6.0 %​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: ( Bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com )
